commands.name: init
commands.description: Initialize a new multi-loader Minecraft mod project

arguments.name: PROJECT_NAME
arguments.description: Name of the project directory to create

commands.name: create
commands.description: Create new mod components (items, blocks, etc.)

subcommands.name: item
subcommands.description: Create a new item with registration code and assets

options.name: --type, -t
options.description: Item type: basic, tool, food (default: basic)

subcommands.name: block
subcommands.description: Create a new block with registration code and assets

options.name: --type, -t
options.description: Block type: basic, ore, pillar, slab, stairs, fence, wall, door, trapdoor, button, pressure_plate, crop

subcommands.name: entity
subcommands.description: Create a new entity with registration code, renderer, and assets

options.name: --type, -t
options.description: Entity type: mob, projectile, animal, monster, villager (default: mob)

examples: dropper create entity magic_bolt --type projectile --spawn-egg false

subcommands.name: biome
subcommands.description: Create a new biome with worldgen JSON configuration

options.name: --category
options.description: Biome category: plains, forest, desert, savanna, taiga, jungle, ocean, river, swamp, mountain, nether, the_end, beach, mesa, mushroom_fields, ice (default: plains)

options.name: --precipitation
options.description: Precipitation type: rain, snow, none (default: rain)

examples: dropper create biome frozen_tundra --temperature -0.5 --precipitation snow --category ice
dropper create biome hot_desert --temperature 2.0 --downfall 0.0 --precipitation none --category desert

subcommands.name: enchantment
subcommands.description: Create a new enchantment with registration code and lang entries

options.name: --rarity
options.description: Enchantment rarity: common, uncommon, rare, very_rare (default: common)

options.name: --category
options.description: Enchantment category: armor, armor_feet, armor_legs, armor_chest, armor_head, weapon, digger, fishing_rod, trident, breakable, bow, wearable, crossbow, vanishable (default: breakable)

options.name: --treasure
options.description: Treasure-only enchantment (not available in enchanting table)

examples: dropper create enchantment soul_speed --max-level 3 --rarity very_rare --category armor_feet --treasure
dropper create enchantment sharpness --max-level 5 --rarity common --category weapon

subcommands.name: recipe
subcommands.description: Create a new recipe JSON file

options.name: --type, -t
options.description: Recipe type: crafting, smelting, blasting, smoking, stonecutting, smithing (default: crafting)

options.name: --shaped
options.description: Use shaped crafting (default: true, only for crafting type)

options.name: --shapeless
options.description: Use shapeless crafting (only for crafting type)

options.name: --cooking-time, -c
options.description: Cooking time in ticks for smelting types (default: 200)

subcommands.name: tag
subcommands.description: Create a new tag with JSON definition

options.name: --type, -t
options.description: Tag type: block, item, entity_type, fluid (required)

options.name: --values, -v
options.description: Comma-separated list of resource locations to include (supports # prefix for tag references)

examples: dropper create tag mineable/pickaxe --type block --values testmod:custom_ore,testmod:hard_block
dropper create tag custom_items --type item --values testmod:item_one,testmod:item_two
dropper create tag minecraft:logs --type block --values testmod:custom_log --replace

subcommands.name: version
subcommands.description: Add support for a new Minecraft version

subcommands.name: asset-pack
subcommands.description: Create a new shared asset pack for multiple versions

options.name: --inherits
options.description: Parent asset pack to inherit from

commands.name: build
commands.description: Build your mod for all configured loaders and versions

options.name: --loader
options.description: Build for specific loader (fabric, forge, neoforge)

options.name: --all
options.description: Build for all versions and loaders (default)
